mr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Queries historical exchange rates for any 'base' and 'symbol' currency pair. When no params passed check EUR - HUF

get_exchange_rates.Rd

Queries historical exchange rates for any 'base' and 'symbol' currency pair. When no params passed check EUR - HUF

get_exchange_rates(
  base_arg = "EUR",
  symbol_arg = "HUF",
  start_date = Sys.Date() - 30,
  end_date = Sys.Date(),
  retried = 0
)

Arguments

base_arg

base currency argument
symbol_arg

to which symbol argument
start_date

date
end_date

date
retried

number of times the function has been retried

Value

data.table object

Examples

get_exchange_rates()

#>           date     rate
#>  1: 2021-05-08 358.4266
#>  2: 2021-05-09 357.9264
#>  3: 2021-05-10 357.7492
#>  4: 2021-05-11 358.7110
#>  5: 2021-05-12 357.4577
#>  6: 2021-05-13 356.8362
#>  7: 2021-05-14 355.1516
#>  8: 2021-05-15 355.1947
#>  9: 2021-05-16 355.3929
#> 10: 2021-05-17 351.6741
#> 11: 2021-05-18 350.6777
#> 12: 2021-05-19 350.7644
#> 13: 2021-05-20 349.4408
#> 14: 2021-05-21 348.5307
#> 15: 2021-05-22 348.5307
#> 16: 2021-05-23 349.0749
#> 17: 2021-05-24 347.2551
#> 18: 2021-05-25 349.0711
#> 19: 2021-05-26 349.8009
#> 20: 2021-05-27 348.1770
#> 21: 2021-05-28 348.1319
#> 22: 2021-05-29 348.1326
#> 23: 2021-05-30 347.8816
#> 24: 2021-05-31 347.3860
#> 25: 2021-06-01 346.2645
#> 26: 2021-06-02 346.5856
#> 27: 2021-06-03 347.3275
#> 28: 2021-06-04 345.9517
#> 29: 2021-06-05 345.9315
#> 30: 2021-06-06 345.9041
#> 31: 2021-06-07 345.7855
#>           date     rate
get_exchange_rates('EUR', 'USD', start_date = '2020-05-12', end_date = '2020-05-13')

#>          date     rate
#> 1: 2020-05-12 1.081257
#> 2: 2020-05-13 1.084693
